abstract: The Procter & Gamble Company has sold its ethnic hair-care products unit, Johnson Products, to a group of investors, including a husband-and-wife team of industry veterans.
lead_paragraph: The Procter & Gamble Company has sold its ethnic hair-care products unit, Johnson Products, to a group of investors, including a husband-and-wife team of industry veterans.

headline.main: Investors Buy Johnson Products from P&G
